name: Sole Active Medium Footbeds - Unisex
description:
Cushy and supportive insoles designed for active use. EVA and Softec foam cushion the impact of each step, and the moisture-wicking top sheet helps feet stay dry and comfortable. Medium insoles are designed to be worn in average-volume footwear with standard insoles, such as running shoes, sneakers and casual shoes.Foam base is made with 20% recycled EVA.Heat-and-wear mouldable for a comfortable and personalized fit.1.6mm Softec open-cell foam adds shock absorption and comfort.Polygiene® antimicrobial treatment resists odour buildup.Latex-free and vegan.

        Sustainability
